Package homework1

package homework1
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DrivingRouteFormatter
    The DrivingDirections class creates a textual description of directions for traversing a route that are suitable for a driver of a vehicle.
    DrivingRouteFormatterTest
     
    ExampleGeoSegments
    This class contains two static arrays representing GeoPoints and GeoSegments near the Technion, as shown in the figure in homework assignment #1.
    GeoFeature
    A GeoFeature represents a route from one location to another along a single geographic feature.
    GeoPoint
    A GeoPoint is a point on the earth.
    GeoSegment
    A GeoSegment models a straight line segment on the earth.
    GeoSegmentsDialog
    A JDailog GUI for choosing a GeoSegemnt and adding it to the route shown by RoutDirectionGUI.
    GeoSegmentTest
     
    Route
    A Route is a path that traverses arbitrary GeoSegments, regardless of their names.
    RouteFormatter
    A RouteFormatter class knows how to create a textual description of directions from one location to another.
    RouteFormatterGUI
    A JPanel GUI for representing a Route.
    WalkingRouteFormatter
    A WalkingDirections class knows how to create a textual description of directions from one location to another suitable for a pedestrian.
    WalkingRouteFormatterTest
